amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for counternarcotics activities by $552 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in part B of House Report 106-549 to cut $552 million of the $1.071 billion in Title I of the bill for "Counternarcotics".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 239 (Roll no. 84).
